    @allure.title("Create Protocol and validate active residue verification SAL when surface area unit is sqcm")
    @allure.description("This test case tests API to Create Protocol and validate active residue verification SAL "
                        "when surface area unit is sqcm and SAL mass unit is mg")
    @allure.link("https://app.clickup.com/t/86cu7jd4z")
    @pytest.mark.formulation
    @pytest.mark.validate_active_residue_direct_indirect_sal_for_mg_sqcm
    def test_validate_active_residue_direct_indirect_sal_for_mg_sqcm(self):
        policy_data = {"useDosage": True, "useToxicity": True, "useProductLimit": True, "useARL": True,
                       "salMassUnit": "mg", "ignoreCombo": False}
        active_data = {}
        get_policy = json.loads(self.update_active_policy.test_get_active_cleaning_limit_policy())
        get_policy = get_policy["policy"]
        sal_unit = get_policy["limitRepresentation"]["productAndEquipmentLimits"]["salMassUnit"]
        update_policy = create_cleaning_limit_policy_active_pyload(get_policy, policy_data)
        active_data.update({"update_policy_payload": update_policy})
        policy_data.update(self.DEFAULT_SURFACE_AREA_SQCM)
        self.update_default_unit.test_update_default_unit(policy_data)
        unit = self.update_default_unit.test_get_default_unit(policy_data)["response"]
        unit = json.loads(unit)["default_units"]["unit"]
    
        if get_policy != update_policy["data"] or sal_unit != "mg" or unit != "sqcm":
            self.change_assessment.test_start_cleaning_assessment(scenario=True)
            self.change_assessment.test_submit_approve_cleaning_assessment()
    
        columns_prod = ["production_id"]
        productions_list = Excel.read_excel_columns(const.get_master_data(), "config", columns_prod)
        data = {"production": productions_list["production_id"], "description": "Automation Protocol"}
        protocol_detail, data = self.setup_protocol(data)
        self.multi_protocol.PROTOCOL = json.loads(protocol_detail)
        data.update({"protocol_name": None})
    
        protocol_id = self.multi_protocol.get_protocol_id(data)
        data.update({"protocol_id": protocol_id, "actives_verification": True})
        data.update({"update_verification_protocol": protocol_verification_payload(data)})
        get_equipment = self.protocol_equipment.get_equipment_protocol(data)["response"]
        self.active_criteria.PROTOCOL_EQUIPMENT = json.loads(get_equipment)
        self.protocol_verification.update_inspection_protocol(data)
        lowest_sal_on_equipment = self.active_criteria.get_active_direct_details_lowest_sal_on_equipment(data)[
            "response"]
        self.active_criteria.DIRECT_ACTIVE_EQUIPMENT = json.loads(lowest_sal_on_equipment)
        indirect_active_sal = self.active_criteria.get_active_indirect_contact_surface_area_details(data)["response"]
        self.active_criteria.INDIRECT_ACTIVE_EQUIPMENT = json.loads(indirect_active_sal)
        direct_equipment = self.active_criteria.direct_update_policy_payload()["equipments"]
        indirect_equipment = self.active_criteria.indirect_update_policy_payload()["equipments"]
        data.update({"direct_equipment": direct_equipment, "indirect_equipment": indirect_equipment,
                     "policy_wise": "equipmentWise", "indirect_policy": "policyBased"})
